page.title: 03Fashion in Newburgh
page.content: If you want to buy clothes you have to go to Aberdeen or Ellon because there are no clothes shops in Newburgh.For school most children wear a uniform of grey skirts or trousers,white or blue shirts.There is also a sweatshirt with the school badge.When you go to gym some people like to wear gym skirts or shorts.Out of school, children like to wear jeans and skirts. Some of them like to wear jogging suits.In the evenings when you go to a disco or a party the fashionable clothes worn are mini skirts and patterned tights and frilly blouses.To save money people make their own clothes.Sometimes old shoes are painted.When teenagers go out,some wear luminous jumpers and socks.Some of them bleach their jeans so there are big white spots left on them.Some boys like to wear leather ties to go out.
